price: 39. Mpe baye soki basali bango mabe, balukaka komilongisa.
arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَصَابَهُمُ ٱلۡبَغۡيُ هُمۡ يَنتَصِرُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā aṣābahumu al-baghyu hum yantaṣirūna
